policy-type.description: Type of a filtering rule. The available options are ACL Name or ACL Number or IP Prefix List or Route policy.

basic-acl.description: Apply basic ACL Name or ACL Number.

name-or-num.description: Apply basic ACL Name or ACL Number.

ip-prefix.description: Set the name of an IP prefix list.
Set the name of an IP prefix list.

l3vpn_schema.description:
Layer 3 Virtual Private Network (L3VPN). An L3VPN is a virtual
private network set up over public networks by Internet Service
Providers (ISPs) and Network Service Providers (NSPs).

check-rt-id.description: Configure automatic modification of conflicted router IDs. If enable, check and resolve OSPF router ID conflict.

conflict-flag.description: Enable/disable automatic modification of conflicted router IDs. If enable, check and resolve OSPF router ID conflict.

advertise-max-cost.description: Configure OSPF LSA advertise max cost globally.

enable.description: Enable/disable OSPF LSAs to advertise max cost globally.

cir-interval.description: Specify the Session CAR CIR interval.

cbs-interval.description: Specify the Session CAR CBS interval.

pir-interval.description: Specify the Session CAR PIR interval.

pbs-interval.description: Specify the Session CAR PBS interval.

cir.description: Specify the Micro Isolation CAR CIR interval.

cbs.description: Specify the Micro Isolation CAR CBS interval.

pir.description: Specify the Micro Isolation CAR PIR interval.

pbs.description: Specify the Micro Isolation CAR PBS interval.

maxage-lsa-protect.description: Configure auto protect of purge LSA error for OSPF.

disable.description: Enable/disable auto protect of purge LSA error for OSPF.
Enable/disable cancel the current setting or default setting.

mib-binding.description: Configure MIB binding an OSPF process.

flush-source-trace.description: Configure OSPF flush source trace globally.

enable.description: Enable/disable OSPF flush source trace globally.

vlink-enable.description: Enable/disable OSPF vlink flush source trace globally.

port.description: Set OSPF flush source trace port allocated by huawei-pp4.The related CLI is 'display ip port info | inc UDP'.

vlink-port.description: Set OSPF vlink flush source trace port allocated by huawei-pp4.The related CLI is 'display ip port info | inc UDP'.

system-control.description: Configure memory overload control and CPU overload control.

route-loop-detect.description: Configure OSPF import route loop detect.

enable.description: Enable/disable OSPF import route loop detect.

check-rt-id_schema.description: Configure automatic modification of conflicted router IDs. If enable, check and resolve OSPF router ID conflict.

conflict-flag.description: Enable/disable automatic modification of conflicted router IDs. If enable, check and resolve OSPF router ID conflict.

advertise-max-cost_schema.description: Configure OSPF LSA advertise max cost globally.

cbs-interval.description: Specify the Session CAR CBS interval.

pir-interval.description: Specify the Session CAR PIR interval.

pbs-interval.description: Specify the Session CAR PBS interval.

cir.description: Specify the Micro Isolation CAR CIR interval.

cbs.description: Specify the Micro Isolation CAR CBS interval.

pir.description: Specify the Micro Isolation CAR PIR interval.

pbs.description: Specify the Micro Isolation CAR PBS interval.

disable.description: Enable/disable auto protect of purge LSA error for OSPF.
Enable/disable cancel the current setting or default setting.

mib-binding_schema.description: Configure MIB binding an OSPF process.

enable.description: Enable/disable OSPF flush source trace globally.

vlink-enable.description: Enable/disable OSPF vlink flush source trace globally.

port.description: Set OSPF flush source trace port allocated by huawei-pp4.The related CLI is 'display ip port info | inc UDP'.
